StateDescription.description:
Rich description for a state in the state machine.

Provides context for an AI verification agent to understand what a state
represents and how to verify it matches expectations.

summary.description: Brief description of the state (1-2 sentences)
summary.title: Summary

expected_elements.description: UI elements that should be visible in this state (e.g., 'Login button', 'Username field')
expected_elements.title: Expected Elements

unexpected_elements.description: UI elements that should NOT be visible in this state - helps detect error dialogs or wrong states
unexpected_elements.title: Unexpected Elements

user_goal.description: Business context - what the user is trying to accomplish when in this state
user_goal.title: User Goal

verification_prompt.description: Custom hints for AI verification - specific things to check or look for
verification_prompt.title: Verification Prompt

StateDescription.title: StateDescription

ActionDescription.description:
Rich description for an action in a workflow.

Provides context for an AI verification agent to understand what an action
is supposed to accomplish and how to verify it succeeded.

intent.description: What this action is supposed to accomplish (e.g., 'Click the submit button to proceed')
intent.title: Intent

preconditions.description: Conditions that should be true before this action executes
preconditions.title: Preconditions

postconditions.description: Conditions that should be true after this action completes successfully
postconditions.title: Postconditions

failure_modes.description: Known ways this action can fail (e.g., 'Button may be disabled', 'Network timeout')
failure_modes.title: Failure Modes

ActionDescription.title: ActionDescription

TransitionDescription.description:
Rich description for a transition between states.

Provides context for an AI verification agent to understand what a transition
accomplishes and how to verify it completed successfully.

intent.description: What this transition accomplishes (e.g., 'Navigate from login to dashboard')
intent.title: Intent

preconditions.description: Conditions that must be true before this transition can occur
preconditions.title: Preconditions

postconditions.description: Conditions that should be true after this transition completes
postconditions.title: Postconditions

failure_modes.description: Known ways this transition can fail (e.g., 'Authentication error', 'Server unavailable')
failure_modes.title: Failure Modes

expected_duration_ms.description: Typical duration of this transition in milliseconds - helps detect performance issues
expected_duration_ms.title: Expected Duration Ms

TransitionDescription.title: TransitionDescription

WorkflowDescription.description:
Rich description for an entire workflow.

Provides high-level context for an AI verification agent to understand
the overall purpose and success criteria of a workflow.

purpose.description: Overall goal of the workflow (e.g., 'Complete user registration process')
purpose.title: Purpose

success_criteria.description: How to determine if the workflow succeeded (e.g., 'User sees welcome message')
success_criteria.title: Success Criteria

steps_summary.description: Human-readable summary of the workflow steps for quick understanding
steps_summary.title: Steps Summary

business_context.description: Why this workflow exists and its importance in the application
business_context.title: Business Context

WorkflowDescription.title: WorkflowDescription
